doc:
Simone (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simone_(actress) 0 Lisa Simone Waymon Stroud (born September 12, 1962), known by her stage name, Simone, is an American singer and actress, known for her work in the Broadway theatre field. She is the daughter of the late American vocalist and civil rights activist Nina Simone. Lisa_Simone_Waymon_Stroud ( born September_12_,_1962 ) , known by her_stage_name , Simone , is an_American_singer_and_actress , known for her_work in the_Broadway_theatre_field . She is the_daughter of the_late_American_vocalist_and_civil_rights_activist_Nina_Simone .
